column.name: payment_policy_type
column.remarks: enum values are RECURRENT and ONETIME

column.name: payment_policy_id
column.remarks: reference to payment policy being used

column.name: current_referrals
column.remarks: copy of user_referrals.current_referrals value at time the user opted-in into program.

column.name: required_referrals
column.remarks: copy of user_referrals.referrals_required value at time the user opted-in into program.

column.name: referrals_duration
column.remarks: copy of user_referrals.referrals_duration value at time the user opted-in into program.

column.name: referrals_duration_type
column.remarks: copy of user_referrals.referrals_duration_type value at time the user opted-in into program.

column.name: matched_timestamp
column.remarks: copy of user_referrals.create_timestamp value at time the user opted-in into program.

changeSet.author: enes (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `u`.`i` AS `i`,((`u`.`userName` = `u`.`deviceUID`) or isnull(`u`.`deviceUID`)) AS `registered`,`udt`.`token` AS `token`,((to_days(now()) - to_days(from_unixtime(`cn_service_at`.`tb_accountLog`.`logTimestamp`))) + 1) AS `days`,`cn_service_at`.`tb_accountLog`.`topupBalance` AS `topupbalance`,if(isnull(`pdt`.`activated`),0,(`pdt`.`activated` + 0)) AS `subscribed`,if(isnull(`pdt`.`i`),0,1) AS `wasSubscribed`,((to_days(now()) - to_days(from_unixtime((`pdt`.`creationTimestampMillis` / 1000)))) + 1) AS `subscriptionDays` from (((`cn_service_at`.`tb_users` `u` left join `cn_service_at`.`tb_paymentDetails` `pdt` on((`u`.`currentPaymentDetailsId` = `pdt`.`i`))) left join `cn_service_at`.`tb_userAndroidDetails` `udt` on((`u`.`i` = `udt`.`userUID`))) join `cn_service_at`.`tb_accountLog`) where ((`u`.`i` = `cn_service_at`.`tb_accountLog`.`userUID`) and (`cn_service_at`.`tb_accountLog`.`transactionType` = 6) and (`u`.`userGroup` = 6))

changeSet.author: enes (generated)
changeSet.createView: (select `chart`.`i` AS `i`,`chart`.`chart` AS `chart`,`chart`.`position` AS `position`,`chart`.`media` AS `media`,`chart`.`prevPosition` AS `prevPosition`,`chart`.`chgPosition` AS `chgPosition`,`chart`.`channel` AS `channel`,`chart`.`info` AS `info`,`chart`.`publishTimeMillis` AS `publishTimeMillis`,`chart`.`version` AS `version` from `cn_service_at`.`tb_chartDetail` `chart` where (`chart`.`publishTimeMillis` = (select max(`chartDetail`.`publishTimeMillis`) AS `max(chartDetail.publishTimeMillis)` from `cn_service_at`.`tb_chartDetail` `chartDetail` where ((`chartDetail`.`chart` = `chart`.`chart`) and (`chartDetail`.`publishTimeMillis` <= (unix_timestamp(now()) * 1000))))))

changeSet.author: enes (generated)
changeSet.createView: select hour(from_unixtime((`u`.`firstDeviceLoginMillis` / 1000))) AS `log_hour`,((count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'REGISTERED') then `u`.`i` end)) + count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'ENTERED_NUMBER') then `u`.`i` end))) + count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'ACTIVATED') then `u`.`i` end))) AS `registered`,(count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'ACTIVATED') then `u`.`i` end)) + count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'ENTERED_NUMBER') then `u`.`i` end))) AS `entered_number`,count((case when (`u`.`activation_status` = 'ACTIVATED') then `u`.`i` end)) AS `activated` from `cn_service_at`.`tb_users` `u` where ((`u`.`userGroup` = 10) and ((`u`.`firstDeviceLoginMillis` / 1000) >= unix_timestamp(cast(now() as date)))) group by hour(from_unixtime((`u`.`firstDeviceLoginMillis` / 1000)))
